thread.title: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel

title: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
text: Posted: 10:16 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015 Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel Related Sponsored Links By Cox Media Group National Content Desk Lamar Odom was found unconscious after reportedly partying for multiple days at Dennis Hof’s Love Ranch South in Pahrump, Nevada. According to TMZ , Odom was airlifted to a hospital in Las Vegas Tuesday night. TMZ reports that the basketball pro athlete and ex-husband of Khloe Kardashian arrived at the ranch on Saturday, Oct. 10 and was found unconscious on Tuesday after partying with a group of women. >> Read more trending stories TMZ reports that the basketball pro athelete arrived at the ranch on Saturday, Oct. 10 and was found unconscious on Tuesday after reportedly partying with a group of women. Upon arriving at a hospital in Pahrump, Odom was intubated and then airlifted to another hospital in Las Vegas for further treatment, TMZ reports. Dennis Hof told Us Weekly that Odom arrived at the ranch on Saturday, Oct. 10, “wanting to get away and have some fun.” According to the Love Ranch South owner, Odom was found unconscious by two women around 3 p.m. on Monday afternoon after they left him to sleep at 6 a.m. After alerting staff that Odom was unconscious, they called 911, who instructed staff to “roll him on his left side.” Hof explains that "a bunch of ugly stuff came out of him." Hof told Us that there were no signs of drugs but that “he was taking herbal viagra.” “He said he was just trying to get away from people so he could have some time to himself without the pressures of being who he is,” Hof said. According to the County Sheriff’s Office, a statement is forthcoming.
